Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Jon Ossoff "will raise your taxes" without providing evidence of any broad-based tax increases proposed by Ossoff.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence provided to substantiate the claim that Ossoff will raise taxes.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Ossoff's stance on taxes is negative without providing sufficient evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation could be that Ossoff's position on taxes is not clearly stated or that it is different from what is claimed, but this is not explored or addressed in the claim.
